topicTitle: Mimeyy's super late application for TTT moderator

posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for:  TTT Moderator 

2) Your age:  17 

3) Your location:  United States. More specifically, Minnesota (Gmt -6) 

4) Current In-Game Name:  Mimeyy 

5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community Profile:  STEAM_0:0:30456959  

6) Tell us about yourself:  Well, I'm Mimeyy. I'm just an average guy I guess, nothing else to say really. Also I know the rules damn near perfect 

7) How did you find out about NNJG:  Storm packed me up in his suitcase and brought me here. (I played on his PERP server and when it died, got involved with TTT and fell in love with the gamemode and awesome community) 

8) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers:  4 months 

9) How long have you been a registered user on Steam:  Since February 10th, 2010. 

10) What you can bring to the NNJG Team:  Moderation 

11) Why do you want to be part of the NNJG Team:  To moderate and help the community to continue being awesome 

12) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for:  I was a moderator on Storm's recent DarkRP server and used to own a small minecraft server I guess. 

13) Have you ever posted a ban request, and if so, was it accepted:  Quite a few, yes 

14) How often do you play on an NNJG server:   Very  often  

15) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it:  Yes I do 

16) How well can you speak the English language:  Pretty swell, if I do say so myself. 

17) How well can you type:  Yes 

18) What is your favorite and least favorite aspect of NNJG:  Favorite: The community is very friendly, I can hop on TTT anytime and have a great time.
Least Favorite: There are times when there are no staff in-game and there are trolls to be taken care of, but only sometimes. Other than that, I can't think of anything to complain about. 

19) Any other comments or information you can provide:  Fact: Mongo's hips don't lie 


  Recommendations  
 http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/ChopperRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/DarklightRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/Dumrec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/FunnyRaffRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/KryzoidRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/LuaRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/MarioRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/MongoRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/MoonyRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/NutterButterRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/PlayerhataRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/PoplRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/PunkedRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/PortalsniperRec.jpg  http://i462.photobucket.com/albums/qq341/Dylan666_2008/QuackRec.jpg
Unfortunately, we are unable to accept your application at this time.
